entry.content:
Calling all sports fans! Candy Funhouse is your best source for buying a gift for those of you who are sports fans, like we are!

Whether it's because spring baseball season is finally here, or because you'd rather not spend hundreds of dollars on a jersey, candy is the gift that everyone would love... especially if it's a sports-focused treat!

These gift ideas are especially gathered for the ones you love who love their sports. Here are some of Candy Funhouse's specialty candy and treats for you to choose from and buy online: 

PEZ Hockey Mask candy dispensers

Of course we had to mention hockey first, we are in Canada after all! Choose from the hockey mask PEZ variety candies including Toronto Maple Leafs, Montreal Canadiens, and for our best bud's next door we have the Boston Bruins, New York Rangers, Detroit Red Wings, and Chicago Blackhawks. Collect them all {HERE] and gift them as a package deal! Scoooore!

Big League Chew

You're in the big leagues when you're into Big League Chew! They'll love the way gum de-stresses after a long day of work, so why not treat them to this nostalgic and fun treat?  Choose from Ground Ball Grape, Swingin' Sour Apple, Wild Pitch Watermelon, Blue Raspberry, Slammin' Strawberry, Cotton Candy, or the Original Boy flavour!

and don't forget about the Big League Chew Baseball Gumball Container!

Maynards Bassetts Sports Mix

For the little ones, for those who love a good chew and a fruity treat, for the sports fan who will get a kick out of this special treat, Candy Funhouse recommends this Sports Mix! They are fruity flavoured gummies shaped like a variety of sports gear, with longer-lasting fruity flavours. Check it!

Kidsmania Dubble Bubble Pro-Ball Candy Toys

Don't forget about the kids! You got them into sports and want to encourage their love for them, right? So gift them one of these innovative treats from Candy Funhouse! Balls are randomly selected from Football, Soccer, Basketball or Baseball, in a sports ball with gum and stickers inside! It's perfect for any occasion – from Easter to birthdays! 

Whether you want to show your sports fan significant other that you respect their sports-fan-ship, or you want to gift them something you can keep later, these sports-based candy and treat ideas from Candy Funhouse will be ones they appreciate! 

Have you seen other sports-based candies you'd love to order from Candy Funhouse online? Share with us so we can add them to our list!
